reviews.text:
Great hotel, a bit scary garage parking, but at least it has one. Very close to the city center.
The rooms feel a bit outdated but they are comfy and offer everything. It has a restaurant and a deck on the upper floor. They are also installing a new lift.

Superb central location. Staff were all polite,friendly & professional (nothing was too much trouble for them including printing our boarding passes) & reception was staffed 24 hours . Breakfast was adequate & The Hotel restaurants food was good too. The Bar was 24hours,plenty of choice of drinks.  The Hotel was very clean & rooms were immaculate too.
Good location. Good service. Rooms aren’t so bad but I didn’t see them all. Free breakfast is decent. Easy check in and out. Market nearby. Good area for staying and ok for short.

This hotel was awful. I don't know who gave them 4 stars. The room looked like it needed renovating for 20 years. The glass in the windows was cracked. There were gaps between the windows where the wind was getting into the room. It was too dark inside, even with the lights on. The bathroom was really disgusting. The shower had a cracked shower tray. There was mould everywhere. There were cables sticking out from under the mirror. We got a room on the fourth floor without a lift. The fourth floor looked like an extension. We had to walk in the rain from the staircase to the room. My son fell over on the slippery tiles. The breakfast was poor. The staff barely communicated in English, at least that was the impression they gave by not responding to our greeting. This hotel sucked and I want to forget this unfortunate joke as soon as possible. The standard comparable to a poor category staff hostel. I don't recommend, in fact I would advise against it.

Very pleasant hotel in good location.  Friendly, clean. Rooms are very basic and the breakfast could be improved. No lift.

Update in February 2024.  This time we had dinner in their restaurant, really not recommended.  Also, the water in the room was not hot and the room did not heat up properly.  Not a good experience.

We have now been to this hotel a few times and I hope that this bad experience is an exception and not a sign of falling standards.
